alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 10:03PM EDT until March 19 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SATURDAY TO 2 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, but 3 to 6 inches expected in far-northeastern Cuyahoga, northern Geauga, southern Ashtabula, and western Crawford Counties. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Ohio, Cuyahoga, Geauga and Ashtabula Inland counties. In Pennsylvania, Crawford county. * WHEN...From 5 PM Saturday to 2 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and poor visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Peak snowfall rates of one inch per hour are possible in intense lake effect bands Saturday evening through early Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
